Class ThreatModel

java.lang.Object
us.springett.threatmodeling.model.ThreatModel
public class ThreatModel extends Object
The root level object for a threat model and/or threat modeling exercise.
Since:
1.0.0

    • getNativeThreatModel

      public Object getNativeThreatModel()
      Returns an object representing the threat modeling tool's native object type. This object may be desired if additional metadata or content from the native object is not represented by the ThreatModel SDK object model.
      Returns:
      an Object specific to the threat modeling tool used.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • setNativeThreatModel

      public void setNativeThreatModel(Object nativeThreatModel)
      Set an object representing the threat modeling tool's native object type. This object may be desired if additional metadata or content from the native object is not represented by the ThreatModel SDK object model.
      Parameters:
      nativeThreatModel - an Object specific to the threat modeling tool used.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • nativeThreatModel

      public ThreatModel nativeThreatModel(Object nativeThreatModel)

      Since:
